long_description: The Eagle Creek Digi Hauler daypack carries your laptop and and other on-board travel necessities on journeys near and far. Carry it like a briefcase with shoulder straps and waistbelt tucked away. Lockable, padded laptop compartment fits most 17 in. laptops. Lockable, self-repairing zippers with finger-friendly zipper pulls on main compartment. Tuck-away backpack straps and waistbelt let you carry the Digi Hauler like a briefcase; multiple padded grab handles provide lots of carrying options. Sternum strap has a built-in whistle, just in case. External compression straps secure and stabilize load. Large interior and exterior zippered pockets provide additional organization. Reflective accents for dusk and nighttime visibility. Integrates with Eagle Creek Pack-It(R) Systems (sold separately) and includes suggestions for organization. Luggage locks are available separately.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Digi Hauler daypack carries your laptop and and other on-board travel necessities on journeys near and far. Carry it like a briefcase with shoulder straps and waistbelt tucked away.
